name: FetchMarketplaceAvailableAddOnExtension
description: Fetch an instance of an Extension for the Available Add-on.

AvailableAddOnSid.description: The SID of the AvailableAddOn resource with the extension to fetch.

Sid.description: The SID of the AvailableAddOn Extension resource to fetch.

$ul: **available_add_on_sid**: The SID of the AvailableAddOn resource to which this extension applies.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**product_name**: The name of the Product this Extension is used within.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the AvailableAddOnExtension resource.
**unique_name**: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
